title: Radiant Diamond Bangles - Modern Kadas
materials: Crafted from 22K Yellow Gold with a bright polish. Features meticulously set
high-clarity (VS) round brilliant cut diamonds. Hyderabadi Polish enhances the gold's rich luster.
features: These modern bangles showcase a unique scalloped edge design accentuated by diamond floral motifs. The diamonds are set in a shared prong setting to maximize light exposure and sparkle. The floral motif offers a contemporary twist on traditional Indian designs.
colors: Warm yellow gold complements the brilliant white sparkle of the diamonds
occasions: or any special occasion where you desire to add a touch of modern elegance to your traditional attire. Also ideal for festive occasions such as Diwali and Sankranthi.
description: A fusion of modern design and traditional craftsmanship. The high-quality diamonds provide exceptional brilliance, making these bangles a statement piece. The durable 22K gold construction ensures longevity, making it a treasured heirloom for generations to come. Lightweight and comfortable for all-day wear.
